Keywords: Celebrity , Fantastic Four , Inhumans , Politician
Real Name: Johnny Storm
Special Powers
DULY APPOINTED MIDDLEMAN OF YOUR PEOPLE AND THE GREAT CITY OF NEW YORK: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Inhumans keyword gain the Fantastic Four keyword and have Fantastic Four team ability.
I DON'T LEAVE FRIENDS BEHIND: Passenger: 2, but only to carry characters that share a keyword. When carrying a character that shares a keyword, Human Torch doesn't modify his speed.
THIS IS FAMILY STUFF...YOU DON'T WANT TO GET IN THE MIDDLE OF IT: Leadership. When Human Torch uses it and removes an action token from a friendly character, choose one:
*Remove an additional action from that character.
*The character has SAFEGUARD: Energy Explosion, Pulse Wave until your next turn.

January 7, 2022
hoojeebo
Actually, no, that is not the intent. When using Running Shot, your movement value is halved, which is a "replacement value", not a modifier. Johnny's trait stipulates that you don't *modify* his movement, which is an outdated reference to how carrying used to reduce your speed value. Replacing and modifying are two separate game terms. So again, no, he still has to halve his movement in order to perform Running Shot, even while carrying, and you can basically ignore the "When carrying a character that shares a keyword, Human Torch doesn't modify his speed" part, because that rule has changed.
January 7, 2022
rxmajor28
Yes, the rules change also allow for this. But yes he can running shot the normal half speed without any other reduction. My apologies, I misread what he had asked.
January 7, 2022
Xombiefaux
Does his ability mean that he can carry some with the same keyword to running shot without halfing his movement?
January 4, 2022
Goop
He's kind of expensive for just an EE piece, both his special powers are not that impressive. Especially the one that is no longer relevant under the new rules. I like the 18ESD but there are far cheaper EE pieces out there. He will most likely always be played on his lower line only to combine FF and Inhuman keywords.
